overview:
Joe Larscheid is the Founder and CEO of EPM Live. He brings over 15 years of experience in project management, product development and business management to EPM Live.

Prior to establishing EPM Live, Larscheid and a consortium of KPMG (Bearing Point) professionals founded LMR Solutions in 1999. LMR Solutions was a leading project management consulting agency. Soon after it’s origination, LMR Solutions partnered with Microsoft and became the go to partner for Microsoft Project Server consulting and implementations. In 2001, LMR Solutions founded EPM Live, a project and work management software company. In 2010, EPM Live made its first acquisition, the EPK Suite. EPM Live is now a leader in Project Portfolio and Work Management software and sofware as a service. EPM Live has been named as one of Inc. 5000’s fastest growing technology companies for four consecutive years. EPM Live has over 5,000 customers and 150 partners in their partner network. EPM Live has a suite of products including ProjectEngine, WorkEngine and PortfolioEngine.
